## Scripts
These are batch files, save them in a .bat format.

1. `install.bat`
```bat
@echo off
echo Installing da tool...

REM Check if pip is installed
python -m pip --version >nul 2>&1
if %errorlevel% neq 0 (
    echo Error: Python pip is not installed or not in PATH.
    exit /b 1
)

REM Install lebon package
python -m pip install lebon -q

REM Check if installation was successful
if %errorlevel% equ 0 (
    echo lebon installed successfully.
) else (
    echo Error: Failed to install lebon.
    exit /b 1
)

exit /b 0
```

2. `run.bat`
```bat
@echo off
echo Running lebon...

REM
lebon

echo lebon execution completed.

pause
```
You may run the tool manually post installation by typing `lebon` in your terminal.

## Note:
- Supported OS: Windows 11
- Get your gemini api key from [here](https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey).
- Copy da MCQ and paste it in da terminal by simply pressing da enter key.
- Wait for the answers to arrive.
- To reset terminal opacity back to 100%, rerun the tool and kill the process by pressing `ctrl+c`.
